arm_group.description: pain induction by noxious heat stimulation, measurement of pain by device and documentation of pain reported by subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
This longitudinal observational study will attempt to objectively measure pain with an
      experimental, non-invasive device. Patients and volunteers will receive a baseline screening
      with psychophysical tests and questionnaires. Investigators will apply the device to measure
      pain during routine clinical care and correlate patients pain ratings and analgesia
      requirements to that measured by the device. A more standardized approach with experimental
      pain stimuli will be pursued in human volunteer studies.

criteria.textblock:

study_pop.textblock: Men and women of all ethnicities will be included.
